page.title: 11SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY.
page.content: { LUMLEY WATER TREATMENT PLANT. Worked totally by computer, Wear water is pumped through a giant pipe to the Treatment Plant.The beautiful foyer of the works houses working models, and the main controls.The water is treated by chemicals,chiefly ferrous sulphate, sulphuric acid,or lime,sulphur dioxide and carbon. The water passes through flash mixers then to clarification tanks. After filtration, the final treated water is chlorinated and piped via the Stoneygate Reservoir to South Tyneside and Washington.A minicomputer controls a direct telemetry link with the Intake Works and the Monitoring Station further upstream. The plant is manned round the clock by a maximum of eight people, minimum one! Output of water is monitored by the Company's Control System.Design is spacious for future extension. {S.Gilroy.
